item.title: LAS VEGAS SANDS CORP 10-K
item.description: LAS VEGAS SANDS CORP, which is in the Hotels & Motels [7011] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 03, 2023 had 51457 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
